import { Link, useLocation } from "react-router-dom" import style from "./header.module.css" import MLC from "./android-chrome-512x512.png" const Header = () => { const currentUrl = useLocation() // window.addEventListener('click', ()=>console.log(currentUrl.pathname)) const handleVisible = (visibility)=> { const hiddenElement = document.getElementsByClassName(`${style.nodes}`) if (visibility = '') hiddenElement[0].classList.add(`${style.visible}`) hiddenElement[0].classList.add(`${style.hidden}`) console.log(hiddenElement[0].classList) } return ( <>

) } export default Header
